source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a dramatic, wide-angle view of a modern high-rise building in a city at sunset. The sky is a striking mix of a bright orange glow on the horizon and dusky, greenish clouds above. The scene is captured from a dynamic, fast-moving perspective that swoops past the building's architecture.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback:
the clouds are grayish rather than greenish. 
the scene also captures the cityscape in addition to the building's architecture.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The clouds appear more grayish than greenish in the video. Additionally, the scene not only highlights the building's architecture but also captures the surrounding cityscape.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The clouds appear more grayish than greenish in the video. Additionally, the scene not only highlights the building's architecture but also captures the surrounding cityscape.

generated_critique: The clouds appear more grayish than greenish in the video. Additionally, the scene not only highlights the building's architecture but also captures the surrounding cityscape. There is a group of people walking along the sidewalk in front of the building.
